attributes.action: Enable hospitality workers from the EU and beyond to work in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Please hold an urgent debate on this matter. Otherwise hundreds and thousands of independent & chain pub, restaurants & hotels will be forced to close or not reopen.
attributes.background: The UK hospitality industry is already on it’s knees. For the businesses that have survived , we now face an even greater challenge as we cannot replace the employees that we need, previously filled by EU + skilled workers. We ask for an immediate visa enabling these people to enter and work here.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584585
